name: 3rd Person Puzzle Multiplayer Demo
description:
This is just a demo of a LAN multiplayer Puzzle game source code available here https://github.com/rafalfaro18/1_Puzzle_Platforms .

Toggle the in-game command line with the key under Esc. Type in Host to launch a server. 

Do the same but instead of Host type Join and the ip address of the server to connect as a client (player 2).
